title: Arma 3 (RUS/ENG/RePack] DangeSecond

Descriptions:
ARMA 3 - a new milestone in the genre of tactical military simulation
independent studio Bohemia Interactive, creators of the acclaimed Operation
Flashpoint.

After several years
exhausting war, Europe has become the last refuge of a weak
fighting NATO forces. Stratis island captured by the enemy from the Middle East and
it will gain guaranteed superiority of NATO in the region.
Operation has begun, "Magnitude": a small group of specially
trained soldiers with scientists under cover sent to
island in the Mediterranean Sea. Mission in danger of collapse! The team almost
completely destroyed, and the main character, Captain Scott Miller
washed ashore enemy island. Complete the operation in his power
but on his way there are the dangers of modern warfare,
ruthless environment and the numerical superiority of the enemy.
Have to think about every step

Features Repack:
